S

secondFactorAuthentication(boolean) - Method in class UserLoginRegistration.Login
This function is used to verify the second factor authentication The hint question is fetched from the DTO only if the first auth flow is true If the login is successful the user is redirected to the admin console.
selectTable(String) - Method in class DatabaseAdmin.ReadWriteToDatabase
This function returns the file content of the specified table
SelectTable(String, String) - Method in class DatabaseAdmin.Query
This function is used to read all the values in a particular table This is achieved by accessing the txt file by simply reading it and printing the results
sqlCommandRefactor(String) - Method in class DatabaseAdmin.Query
This function decomposes the sql statement into an arraylist The arraylist contains various keywords that is used to process
SqlExecuter - Class in DatabaseAdmin
This is a sample light weight database application That can have multiple users and can have multiple tables and database for each user The scope of the login exists beyond the execution of the program as the authentication Information is stored in the log file present at - src/main/java/Assets/userAuth.txt landing page is where the entire application is bootstrapped at.
SqlExecuter() - Constructor for class DatabaseAdmin.SqlExecuter
 
sqlQueryDecomposer(String) - Method in class DatabaseAdmin.SqlExecuter
This function removes the delimiter for further processing.
storeUserDetails() - Method in class UserLoginRegistration.Login
This function parses the string that stores the entire file content and finds the username, password, hint question and hint answer in the userAuthDTO The data stored in the DTO list can be used to verify the login credentials of the current user trying to login
